gremlins

Class Destructable

  • java.lang.Object
    • gremlins.Entity
      • gremlins.Immobile
        • gremlins.Destructable

  • public class Destructable
extends Immobile
    Destructable class: blocks that extend from immobile entities can be destroyed and deleted by the wizard's projectiles

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class gremlins.Immobile

        texture, viable

      • Fields inherited from class gremlins.Entity

    • Constructor Detail

      • Destructable

        public Destructable(int x,
                    int y,
                    processing.core.PImage defaultTexture,
                    processing.core.PImage[] decayTextures)
        Constructor for destructable object
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of destructable block
        y - y coordinate of destructable block
        defaultTexture - the sprite used by a non-destroyed block
        decayTextures - an array of textures that will be displayed upon a wizard projectile collision.

        public int update()
        Updates the current texture of the destructable block by setting the current state.
        Specified by:
        update in class Immobile
        Returns:
        1 for destructable bricks to recgonise that they have been updated.
